code: export function getCookie(name){const value=`; ${document.cookie}`;const parts=value.split(`; ${name}=`);if(parts.length===2)return parts.pop().split(';').shift();}export function setCookie(name,value,days){const date=new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+days*24*60*60*1000);document.cookie=`${name}=${value};expires=${date.toUTCString()};path=/`;}
